page.title: 12SCHOOL HEADMASTERS
page.content: {Mr.Downs,Headmaster Gawsworth School. What is it like to be a headmaster? "It is a responsible job.One wants to do the best for the children _ to give each child a good all round education." What are your responsibilities? "To produce a balanced curriculum.To encourage children to achieve their best.To keep a well managed school.To keep good firm, fair discipline.To produce a happy, interesting environment." What is the hardest part of the job? "Making the correct collective decisions which are right for the school,staffing(replacing teachers)". Which subjects are the most important? "The subjects which are going to equip children for future life ,Reading , English Language and Mathematics." Interview by Sally Brinton.
